screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Google Play Store page for the Duolingo app. It shows the app's name, "Duolingo: language lessons," along with the option to either uninstall or open the app. Below, there are suggested apps such as TIDAL, Airbnb, and Calm, along with user ratings. Additionally, the "You might also like" section lists other apps like Home Workout, The Weather Channel, and Babbel. At the bottom, there is information about the app, including available languages and free learning options.
history_actions: click on the "Play Store" icon located at the right and lower part of the screen.

think.Thought: The current screen shows the Duolingo app page in the Google Play Store. Since the user requested to uninstall 'Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit,' which is not the app displayed, I need to navigate to the list of installed apps and locate Lyft. I will go back to the home screen and find the Lyft app to uninstall it.
Future Action Plan: Press the home button to return to the home screen.
Locate the 'Lyft' app on the home screen or app drawer.
Long-press the 'Lyft' app icon and select 'Uninstall'.
